title: 2 bedrooms apartment in south Philly for rent
description:
Greeting Philadelphia renters.
Renter wanted :
My aunt has a 2 bedrooms apartment on the corner of 22nd & McKean street in south Philly for rent and is available for moving in starting on 5/8/2022.
If anyone interested, please leave me a message. 1 month of deposit and proof of income are required.
Below are more information of the place > It is on the 2nd floor and is at the corner.
a) the size of the big room is ~ 174 square feet + 2 clothing closets
b) the size of the smaller room is ~ 100 sq ft (with no closet)
c) size of living room is ~ 205 sq ft
d) size of the patio outside is ~ 220 sq ft
e) images of the kitchen and  the bathroom are shown below.
It is about 4 minutes drive to the I-76 freeways entrances that can take you to Grey Ferry neighborhood, South street, Drexel University, and University of Penn in less than 20 minutes.  Plenty of parking within 2 blocks distance. Laundromats are 1 and 2 blocks away.  Shoprites supermarket, Home Depot, BJ's are about 4 minutes away also.
FYI : 22nd street is a wide street.  Rent is $1,200/month.
2nd > entrepreneur wanted :
If you want this apartment to be both your living space and business office, we can accommodate that for you too.
We can put a glass door in front entrance to make it looks business-like.
You would need to have a business license. You don't need business insurance for the premise if you will be starting tutoring/teaching/consulting small.
May be in the near future, i would want to share the space with you for my business.
I can add a desk with 2 computers in the living room and make use of the computers for a few hours a week.

title: Under Contract! Gorgeous home available in the Westover neighborhood
description:
Welcome to 102 Shelly Lane! This beautiful home is now available in the desirable Westover neighborhood. Fieldstone Front with Cedar Shake Siding welcome you into this immaculately-cared for 4 bedroom, 3 full bath classic.
The Gourmet kitchen is complete with Dark Red Maple Cabinetry offering Pull-Out Drawers, Granite Countertops and Stainless Appliances, Eat-in seating leading to the dining area. Enter into the Peaceful 17' x 11' screened-in porch from the French Doors in Dining Room that overlooks the spacious backyard and is equipped with a ceiling fan and tile flooring. Hardwood floors throughout the main and upper levels of the home. Large living room with floor-to-ceiling stone-faced wood-burning fireplace with lots of natural light flowing through the bay window.
One bedroom in the lower level near a full bath and access from the 2-car garage which is great for guests or in-law situation. Wood Burning Stove in the Family Room with a Stacked Stone Wall and a laundry room leading to the back yard, complete the lower level. Upper level of the home includes the master bedroom with full bathroom, two additional great size bedrooms and hall full bath.
Located on a Dead-end Street with views of The Delaware Canal, Pennsbury Schools, close and convenient to all major commuting routes.

title: Incredible Corner Home in Pennsport for Rent!
description: Check out this uniquely designed and newly rehabbed home located on one of the best blocks in Pennsport. 1653 S Lawrence Street was fully rehabbed just 2 years ago and is located just a half block from Dickinson Square Park. Spanning 16 feet wide, this corner home features a ton of windows allowing the natural light to just pour in. The exterior of the home has been recently painted and offers 2 separate entrances, one on the side just off the kitchen, and one on the corner into the living room. The living room comes equipped with massive Pella windows and 12 foot ceilings, making the home feel super bright and inviting. Head past the living room and into the kitchen / dining area to the newly upgraded space. The kitchen features butcher block countertops with island seating, stainless steel appliances, a penny-tile mosaic backsplash, blue cabinets, and so much more. The home features a private and inviting rear yard just off the kitchen, perfect for outdoor entertaining (rear fence has been painted and railing on interior stairs installed after pictures were taken). Head downstairs to your clean but unfinished basement, with tall ceilings and full washer and dryer. The basement is perfect for storage, an office, or small workout area and comes equipped with another full bathroom. Head to the top floor and check out 2 spacious bedrooms, each with their own full bathroom. The secondary bedroom has a nice sized bathroom with subway tile and a full bathtub. The primary bedroom is gigantic and features two large closets, one of which is a full walk-in closet with tons of space. Just off the primary bedroom is a stunning primary bathroom, with massive shower, large vanity, and beautiful tile design. Central air and heat, recessed lighting and so much more. Located on one of the best blocks in Pennsport close to coffee shops, restaurants and bars. Also situated just a 1 minute walk to Dickinson Square Park - one of the nicest parks in all of Philly. This home has it all, and is just waiting for you to call it yours. Inquire now for your private showing before it is too late!

Broadridge is an unrivaled community filled with sculptural, modern elements and endless amenities that deliver an unparalleled living experience. These reside in between rich cultural attractions like the Met and the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Unit Amenities include custom-crafted light-oak grain and navy cabinetry, Euro-styled stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and microwave, nine-foot ceilings, sweeping city views in most residences, and your own washer and dryer. title: 3 Beds 2 Baths & 1,445 Sqft Torresdale home for rent
description: A rare opportunity to live on a highly desired block in Torresdale! Welcome to this well maintained twin home situated on a wide cul de sac that has so much to offer its new owner! Step into the side entrance to find a bright and sun drenched spacious living room and dining room which flow right into a recently updated and modern kitchen. The kitchen boasts newer appliances, ample cabinetry and counter space to store and prepare to your imagination! Head down the hallway to find a bright spare bedroom and primary bedroom, both rooms offer a generous amount of closet space! Adjacent to the primary bedroom you'll find a brand new bathroom finished with neutral designer tiles and has shared access from the hallway. Head downstairs to a large, bright and open family room/den with a closet that has been converted into a mini office space to keep your work needs tucked away! The family room has access to the rear patio and large manicured fenced in yard perfect for pets, entertainment or to host a nice sized barbecue. Head back inside beyond the family room to find another bedroom and full bathroom. To round off this level, there's a laundry room with a full sized side by side washer and dryer and a one-car garage with shelving and space for storage! This home is super convenient to I-95, State Rd, in walking distance to playgrounds, the Delaware River, popular bars and restaurants such as Maggie's Waterfront Cafe and the Fish Hatchery. It's also convenient to the Torresdale train station for a quick ride to Center City. ☎ WE ARE OPEN and would love to show you around, please call to schedule your tour!  show contact info

description:

title: Each thoughtfully designed unit includes kitchens
description:
Broadridge is an unrivaled community filled with sculptural, modern elements and endless amenities that deliver an unparalleled living experience. Each thoughtfully designed unit includes kitchens with custom-crafted cabinetry, bathrooms with novel design elements, and open floorplans for the modern connoisseur. Located in one of Philadelphia's most vibrant neighborhoods, Broadridge brings the best of an urban community together with a luxurious place to call home. Here, access to spaces designed for coworking, lounging, and fitness are complemented by unique features like a personal theater, expansive pool and deck, pet spa, and state-of-the-art demonstration kitchen. Steps outside Broadridge you'll find an energetic neighborhood that boasts diverse treasures like Umai Umai and La Calaca Feliz and local favorites like Fairmount Farmer's Market and Bad Brother. These reside in between rich cultural attractions like the Met and the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Unit Amenities include custom-crafted light-oak grain and navy cabinetry, Euro-styled stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and microwave, nine-foot ceilings, sweeping city views in most residences, and your own washer and dryer. Building amenities include a lounge, coworking space, fitness center, screen room, pet spa, laundry room, demonstration kitchen, pool, deck and lounge, the West Roof Terrace, dog run, and East Terrace. **Parking Pricing: $175 unreserved $199 reserved ***Availability and Pricing is Subject to change ** **Photos are of model units
